description: Displays the tags associated with a CloudWatch Logs resource. Currently, log groups and destinations support tagging.

parameters.name: resourceArn
parameters.description: The ARN of the resource that you want to view tags for. The ARN format of a log group is arn:aws:logs:Region:account-id:log-group:log-group-name The ARN format of a destination is arn:aws:logs:Region:account-id:destination:destination-name For more information about ARN format, see CloudWatch Logs resources and operations.
